scripts.db:shell: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec db mysql -u root allmusic
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.test:headed: docker-compose run --rm playwright npx playwright test --headed
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:rebuild:all: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
